website_summaries.verdict: Budget-friendly pick for customers who want a traditionally styled, reliable lunch box.
pros: Upper compartment for storing delicate food items
Includes small front pocket for napkins and utensils

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this bag because it was one of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag because it was one of the highest related lunch bags on Amazon. The side of the bag ripped after 3 weeks of use. The inner fabric and the Styrofoam is all exposed. Unfortunately, the return window for the order just closed...
customer_reviews.author: Tea Clouds

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke off on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because of the reviews. Initial quality looked promising. But from the first use one the zippers just came right off. I'm pretty dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: My husband was tired of carrying his lunch in a small lunch box. Everything was squished and he was not happy. After doing a little research we decided on this lunch box. He is very happy with the amount of food he can put into this lunch box. He uses the top mostly for things that he doesn't want to get crushed and uses the bottom for heavier items like cans, bottles, and tupperware containers. Plenty of room for ice packs as well. The blue is just like in the photo. It is a very well made lunch box and will last him a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: Major Structural Design Flaws
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is much larger than it appears online. The bottom (main) compartment would not hold what I needed it to. The top part which I consider to be a secondary area is larger than the bottom and causes it to be top heavy. The strap is not stitched into the product and instead attaches to clips that are poorly secured to the top part of the cooler. I ended up going with the 9 can Cooler by Coleman that not only fit more than this one did in spite of smaller dimensions but the strap is stitched into the actual product and is much more solid.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality; Ripped in only 4 Days!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this negative zero stars. A hole opened up along back zipper area of lower section, after only 4 days normal usage. I had high hopes for this lunch bag because organizational compartments were perfect for what my husband needed. Material seemed like it would be perfect upon arrival but after less than a week in, it is unusable. Don't waste your money. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I love the size but I have to keep it in ...
customer_reviews.text: This lunch box doesn't actually keep things very cold- even with ice packs in it. I love the size but I have to keep it in the fridge at work to keep it cold. It also arrived with a very strange odor.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M Williams

customer_reviews.title: I really like the separate storage space above the cold storage to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a big durable lunch box. Plenty of space for an entire days meals. I really like the separate storage space above the cold storage to carry my tablet, keys..etc. I was looking for a bag that was large enough to rid me of a separate messenger bag and this one does that. My ice pack is still partially frozen at the end of the day so the insulating quality is very good. I highly recommend this lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Hardly adult size. I work in an industrial setting and have to carry something for breakfast and lunch and you can forget it with this bag. Flimsy as well. Too small for a Tupperware plate. Would be ok for school but not for a man to carry to work.
customer_reviews.author: dgf David

customer_reviews.title: Practical and sturdy lunch box.
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in the convention installation business and the halls rarely have many food concessions available for the laborers. So he brings his own lunch every day along with tons of energy snacks and liquids. This lunch box is perfect, the best one he's ever had. It's sturdy, lightweight, strong, and big enough to hold everything I just mentioned plus several ice packs. It wipes clean with a damp cloth and holds up to being used roughly, because he doesn't have time to be gentle with it. It's grab, open, eat, toss, and go back to work. Even the zipper has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and tough
customer_reviews.text: The black one is LARGE, the red one is MEDIUM. I got the red one and my husband was intrigued, so I bought him the large. The split sections is great, especially if you want to carry items (like protein bars) that don't need ice. Box has two large side pockets, and one front zippered one. Side pockets on LARGE are roomy enough for hubby's ipad.
customer_reviews.author: deluxeczech

customer_reviews.title: This might work for others but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This might work for others but not for me. The bottom part isn't big enough for my lunch containers - it's a squeeze. If i hadn't already used it and thrown away the packaging, I would return it. My advice is to measure your containers and compare it to the inside measurements of the lunch box before buying. No complaints about the construction, which seems sturdy, but the way it was designed doesn't work for me. I'm really disappointed, I wanted to love it. I'm back online today purchasing another one with larger measurements for my containers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gross

customer_reviews.title: The insulation is mediocre at best, won't hold up for a full day of ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoulder strap is junk, broke the first day out. The insulation is mediocre at best, won't hold up for a full day of use. I use those expensive cooler shock ice packs but the bag doesn't stay cold enough really, and the outside gets cool to the touch so you know it isn't well insulated. Otherwise well made, great if you just need a carry bag to keep your lunch in a fridge or keep it cold an hour or two in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for price and durability!
customer_reviews.text: I bought and used this product for my daily lunch cooler (4-5 days/week). Last week the fabric separated along the top handle. I checked my account to see when I purchased it and it was just over 2 years ago. Enough said: I ordered a replacement and started using it yesterday. I like the two compartments and combo shoulder strap and handle, and the 3 exterior pockets (one zipped). All get used regularly. Lots of space for meal items, ice pack, drink bottle etc. I even carry a collapsed mini umbrella in the top section.
customer_reviews.author: Drew400

customer_reviews.title: It's well made and a perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium size product to bring food and drink to work for lunch and I'm very happy with my purchase. The size is perfect, it is well made, and the two compartments allow you to separate items as needed. It has a wide shoulder strap that is adjustable so it's easy to carry. I bought this for use for work, but I think it's also something to use if you are traveling or attending a sporting event and want to bring food and drinks for the day. You can definitely fit 1-2 small/medium ice blocks as well to keep items cold and overall it's pretty insulated. I would purchase again and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kay S.

customer_reviews.title: nice to see things made with quality.
customer_reviews.text: this is a geat lunch box. I feel silly for not replacing my discount store version sooner. The material is heavy canvas, lined with rubber/plastic inside. plenty of space for various containers and bottles. Ice packs fit in with the foot. heavy straps, great handles, good zippers. this should last for quite some time! ** i had a leaking coffee mug in the bag recently and it did not leak at all....the coffee made a mess, but the bag saved the back seat of my car!
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to receive the Mier lunch box in blue. It easily accommodates my two plastic ware containers with salad and the main meal, plus the frozen cooling blocks, plus snacks with room to spare. The color is exactly as pictured, the zippers function easily, and the little side pocket is good for napkins. I would highly recommend this. Now for the sad news--I left this on the breakfast room chair, and my mini-wiener dog pulled it down and chewed it to bits. I ordered a different bag, that while cute, is not functional and doesn't hold very much. Now, I'll order the blue Mier bag all over again. Should've stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Very high qaulity at a low price
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a ton of room, yet isnt bulky. its easy to carry and fits easily into the fridge at home and at work. I've been carrying my lunch in plastic bags because I needed more room than most lunch bags provide. This is a solid product, high quality and thick material, and an excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox that looks like a small bag almost
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile lunchbox or cooler. Small enough height wise to fit on the smaller shelves at work while everyone else has the huge lunchboxes they lug around that have to go on bottom. Gave it 4 stars for durability as one side is a little crushed and saggy from when it came folded when it was packaged. Kind of annoying but not a deal breaker. Has room for 2 to 3 bottles of water laying flat in lower compartment with a Tupperware container for my lunch on top of the bottles. Up in the top compartment I keep snacks and other items I use on the daily. Front zip compartment is great for pencils, meds, silverware etc.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderOKC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I love love love my new lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I love love love my new lunch bag. This was exactly what I was looking for. Can hold up to 2 lunch plates in the bottom compartment and another in the top compartment
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Best Lunch/Purse EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this lunch bag. THERE IS SO MUCH STORAGE SPACE!! I load the top with my meal prep containers and water bottle( it ALL FITS) and the bottom with books/journals for downtime,wallet pouch, makeup pouch... Then there are pockets. The straps are very sturdy and all the storage helps me limit my “bag lady look”. Leave that purse in the car girls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this, BUT I've used this occasionally for the last month and one of the straps already broke! Snapped off. Hard to believe since this is not exactly a cheap lunchbox.
customer_reviews.author: LC Fellers

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for taking lunch and snacks to work. The bottom compartment is of sufficient depth and width to hold most common tupperware type containers. The upper compartment has a little less insulation and is a perfect place for chips and the like. The outer storage spaces are a nice touch, but you won't be able to put much in them, a bag of cashews or the like. When you first get it, it's kind of "mushed" down in the shipping box, thus is a little top heavy and tips over easily, but after use, this goes away. I don't use the shoulder strap, but the carrying handle is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brod

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is difficult!
customer_reviews.text: The zipper gets stuck; it's on the side and slides down and across and back up. Why the U-shaped opening? And why the substantial zipper that catches instead of glides? When a driver is on the road and needs to reach something in that top portion, it's super cumbersome. Interior wipes and disinfects easily. The exterior catches dirt so it's good thing it's black. It holds two standard ice packs on the bottom - keeps food cold. For infrequent access, it would be OK. The upper portion is nice for extra pair of glasses, medication, small flashlight, handi wipes, first aid kit, etc.
customer_reviews.author: mdc

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a lunchbox for work that I could carry my keys, wallet and CCW pistol in, and this seemed like it would fit the role perfectly. When I received the delivery, the lunchbox was shoved into a very thin box. I pulled it out and it had a couple creases in it. I figured they would go away after a few days, but three months later it still won't stand up on it's own because of the creases. Most recently, the plastic piece that covers the carry handle broke, and now pinches your fingers when carrying it. It will go in the trash when I get home today. I would not recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox! Plenty of space
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunch box for me. If there is one minor complaint, it might be too big, but I'd rather have something that is slightly too big than slightly too small. The top container holds plenty; it's big enough to bit my 30oz water bottle. The bottom portion can handle multiple tupperware or other things that are similarly sized. I don't use the shoulder strap because I find it easier to carry by the handle, so I removed the strap and keep it in the small front pocket in case I do ever need/want it.
customer_reviews.author: UGADawg2006

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I've made the decision to start packing my lunch, and this cooler tote looked like a great option. It had separate compartments and was large enough overall to provide a lot of flexibility. After a week of use, I'm really happy with the purchase. Two slim cool packs (each) keep the compartments cool for both food (salads with meat/cheese/veggies) and drinks (bottled water). The food is crisp and fresh and the drinks are adequately chilled after 5 hours out of the fridge. Clean-up (only moisture, so far) is as simple as wiping out with a paper towel. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not very large inside
customer_reviews.text: When they say a 6 pack they mean a 6 pack. Was hoping i could fit two locking lid glass containers inside but when stacked on top of each other you can barely close it much less put a ice pack in there to keep it cold. Top compartment is nice for extra items but its really more for storage then for a food container and ice pack. Don't know if its leak proof easy to clean o Durable. Its being returned tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Darcomg

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!
customer_reviews.text: It is much bigger than I expected it to be; I somehow missed the last picture where it showed a person holding it. I'm not sure why someone would need to take that much food with them somewhere! I'm going to keep it even though I feel odd bringing what my coworkers and I now call the lunch suitcase to work. It feels high quality and it nice looking. But if you are looking for something medium size to take to work, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Maryalice

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. It’s huge! I needed something that would fit everything needed for a day, including water. I am back to work at the office and don’t want to have to go to the break room due to the virus. It looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha B

customer_reviews.title: Well Insulted
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed. Throw a cold pack in with frozen or refrigerated food and it will stay cold all day, even if it is left at room temperature. It also allows for different temperature items to stay properly cooled/heated in the separate sections. Frozen lunch meals fit perfectly in this and it goes anywhere. Give it a try and you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cooler so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy to bring to work due to the straps. I lug a backpack and carry a coffee cup into the office everyday so the straps are nice to have. Keeps my food cold with the addition of some ice packs I got off Amazon. You can fit a good number of beers in this thing too. The compartment on top is nice for brining things you don’t want or need to be cold like chips or cookies. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jzanko

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and keeps it cold
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this lunchbox. He likes the different compartments and that both the upper and lower compartments are insulated. We put 2 "Fit & Fresh Slim Reusable Ice Coolers" in EACH compartment and he uses the Fitpacker Meal Prep Containers for food. Everything stays cold through his long workday in his locker (not a fridge). This hold a lot, too, which is great since sometimes we have to pack for 2 meal breaks. No complaints. I tried to embroider his initials on the top flap, but the material is too thick for my sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A well made cooler that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: it holds 30 oz water bottles easily in both top or bottom pockets. It holds foods well. I use 4 ice thingys to keep it cool inside and it keeps my food cool for up to 8 hours easily. At first when received, it came flat. So I was concerned it wasn't going to pop open and stay open and not fall flat. After about a day, it had popped open far enough that it stayed open like a good sized cooler and been good since. Zippers work well for opening and closing. You will be happy with it when you get one. No cons actually to say. That's a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room, bigger than expected..
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that can pack enough for a whole day at work. This thing can do that AND some. It's much bigger than I thought, even after looking at the size diagram. Looks and feels durable. Insides easy to clean. Multiple compartments. If you want something that you can store a lot of food for the day, this is it. I also ended up buying a smaller lunch box for the days I don't feel like brining my fridge with me.. haha!
customer_reviews.author: Islasian4life

customer_reviews.title: The best lunchbox...ever!
customer_reviews.text: We love this lunchbox. Plenty of space for two people, easy. We can fit two large lunches in the bottom compartment; Tylenol, phones, and keys in the top compartment; and silverware and condiments in the front compartment. It's really big. The material is easy to clean, and we've never had to worry about leakage. It can handle a rogue mustard packet or a leaky water bottle, easy. Great for greats, adults, and everyone in between.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A little tricky
customer_reviews.text: Bottom compartment a little small. Using for lunches and one plastic container is about all that fits flat. Anything additional has to go up top but was hoping to have "dry" (not needed to be cold) items like chips etc. But...I have to put any other container wanting to keep cold up top too with it's own "freezie" and not very conducive to keeping chips, or crackers crisp! I wish the bottom compartment was larger (taller) and the top one smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Munchnmonkey

customer_reviews.title: Nice lunch box for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It is very large and can hold a lot of items. There are two side pockets, a main compartment and another compartment below that one. A zipper separates the two compartments. The bottom one can hold containers with a flat bottom. I wish that was the bigger of the two compartments but it’ll do for the time being. If you are looking for a lunch box that can hold juices or bottles upright then this will not work for you. Bottles have to be laid flat which I usually don’t like because they are more prone to leakage that way. If you aren’t looking for that feature then it’s a decent lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon 1909

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and sturdy and appears to be long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This keeps foods hot or cold. Purchased this along withand it fits perfectly. The top part is just big enough for a 16 oz. beverage. It is nice and sturdy and appears to be long lasting. It a nice investment if you want to take you lunch to work and save time and coin. The divided lunch container fits and still allows room to place a sandwich and utensils in the lower zippered compartment. There is also a zippered pocket in front for this, but cannot imagine you would fit much in there.
customer_reviews.author: SRKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch box! In the bottom compartment I can get one ice pack and 8 cans of drinks in it, or two ice packs and 5 cans of drinks. The top compartment is great for storing items you dont want chilled like bags of chips...I can easily fit my JBL Charge 3 outdoor speaker in the top compartment with room to spare. Keeps cold items (using an ice pack) cold for 6 to 7 hours. Was a great investment for a lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Davy Crockett Murray

customer_reviews.title: It's just too big.
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an insulated lunch bag that I got from Dean & Deluca about 15 years ago. I believe this one will also last a long time, it's very durable. I bought the larger size and I wish I got the smaller one. It's really big - it's the height of my brief case. If you eat HUGE lunches or need to hold two substantial meals then this one is for you. If, however, you're bringing a normal sized lunch opt for the smaller one or another type.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: This is one tough lunch box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He works in heavy construction and every lunch box I get him gets destroyed very quickly... like a matter of days. He has had this for months and it hasn’t leaked or tore once. It keeps his food cold all day long. It’s light weight but heavy duty. The compartments are perfect sized. I usually pack his drinks on top and food on bottom for the whole day and he still usually has room for more. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: So far it's the best but...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many lunch boxes and bags, but this one is the best so far. The insulated lining is backed up by a thick layer if some sort of foam and actually keeps my drinks cold while I work driving all day. The bottom compartment could be a bit bigger, but I make it work. The front pocket is too small for anything other than my pens, and the side pockets holds my charging cords just fine. I may buy this again and recommend this to all my fellow drivers.
customer_reviews.author: PxToro

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE*. They replaced the bag free of charge. They took the time to contact me and even wrote a hand written card apologizing for the mishap. Excellent customer service and a big shout out and thank you to Abby!!! I just received the product today and to be honest I am a little worried about the quality. As you can see in the pictures the stitching is off centered and thread looks loose. Should I have bought an igloo??? Will it hold up????
customer_reviews.author: jr64495

customer_reviews.title: Love how Spacious it was but..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband back in August last year and it ripped in two months. Not just ripped like a small tear, but the strap ripped and the bottom zippers ripped on the lower pocket, and the side pocket. My husband is not one to just toss things out -especially if it costs more than what he would have spent. He still uses it but he paper clips the zipper part and ties the straps every other week to keep the handle from slipping off. He wants a new lunch bag but seems to be okay with using Mier's bag for now; however, I am not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: You want space, you’ve got it!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag for over a year now and it’s great! I use it to carry my lunch for work (in the bottom compartment) and other items including my personal hygiene kit and wallet (in the top compartment). In the past I’ve taken it to the beach and it kept my cold drinks cold for about 5 hours which is quite amazing for a bag at this price point. I used diaper wipes to remove the sand that made its way inside but it’s an easy bag to clean. It’s very sturdy, durable, spacious, and easy to carry with its adjustable strap and handle.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Like a first date, this thing is good for a slightly-too-large meal and a drink or three. It's big. Unlike the claims that might be made on a first date, this is actually of considerable size -- almost excessive. It maintains a pretty stable temperature -- things don't warm up or cool down quickly. So, I guess, also not really like a first date. This isn't very expensive, and is pretty predictable on what you receive. So, really, it's nothing like a first date. Except good for a fair amount of food and some drinks.
customer_reviews.author: JohnNE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our use for my son's co-op's snack time
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our use for my son's co-op's snack time. I needed something to keep our cold water cups separate from our food. I don't like sandwiches and chips or crackers and fruit getting crushed by heavy water bottles/thermoses... So it is awesome to have the food in a completely separate section on top of the thermoses. PLUS, I love that you don't have to dig through items stacked on top of one another. Two sections means I can easily see and grab what I'm looking for right away.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Tough, pleanty of room in the top and lower section without being oversized. I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Git this to hold my bottled beverages when I Umpire Little league games. With the shoulder strap I added two carabineers and the bag can easily be coming clipped to the backstop. The color does not distract players as it blends into the fence. I put two flat ice packs in the top and it still can hold about four bottles. Last game I had two water bottles and one gateraide bottle . The bottom area I put some extra gear. Count clicker, sunglasses, etc I am sure it will also be great as a true lunch box to go to the beach or other spots
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot and keeps food cool until lunch time
customer_reviews.text: It's a large lunch bag, but its perfect for meal prep. My husband uses his daily. It easily fits several containers in the bottom section, with or without canned drinks if you like. The upper portion holds a lot as well. Its great for every day use. We also use re-freezable ice packs with it, it stays cool until lunch time. We've had it a few months and it seems to be holding up well. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieAnne

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional as a lunch pail
customer_reviews.text: Awful lunch pail. The compartments make absolutely no sense. It has two compartment , one up at the top and one at the bottom..and the lunch pail is so bulky you would expect it to fit more stuff. Also there are little pockets on the side which I can’t figure out what is supposed to fit in them...definitely not a water bottle or even a spoon. I bought it for my husband as a birthday gift and by the time he got to open it my return window closed so I can’t even return it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It's lasted me awhile and the other day I noticed all my food was hot and my ice pack was melted. Come to find out I had a huge hole in the side where the seams had split. I don't even pack it heavy with anything just a couple sandwiches and chips.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron

customer_reviews.title: ORDER THIS NOW! BEST LUNCH KIT EVER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Very durable, and insulated! I bought this for my husband a month ago and it's the best and worth the money! I can keep stuff in here insulated for over 12 hours with ice packs I purchased! It's easy to wipe out and down. It's the perfect size for women or men. Make the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: nice bag, well made and roomy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a little taller than your average lunch bag but not too big for everyday use. i like that i can now comfortably fit my large containers and not have to stress the zippers. stays nice and cold. the top compartment easily fits my coffee travel mug, and 2 water bottles. everything in one bag! well made and color is as shown in the photos too.
customer_reviews.author: Hi, its me again!

customer_reviews.title: Durable Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a big daddy lunch box! Don’t get this unless you are serious about lunch! This is a double decker lunch box that is spacious in both compartments. And don’t be fooled by the top compartment. The opening might trick you into thinking it’s small, but I am able to easily fit 3 bottles of water in the top with other candy bars and small snacks and easily zip it. The bottom is spacious as well and accommodates all different kinds of tupperware, even taller ones. Zippers still intact, durable, quality material. I’ve had it a couple of months, and it hasn’t given me any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jwoodall

customer_reviews.title: Best lunch bag I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: I’ve received many compliments on my lunch bag. I love the 2 compartments and the extra pocket in the front. I use it for my utensils. I also like the options of holding it by hand or over my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier with my new lunch bag. Keeps things cool all day with an ice packs. Very happy with the smaller size. The top is big enough for 2 + sandwiches & ice pack. The bottom is big enough for 2 water bottles, 2 oranges, 2 apples, 2 ice packs with room to spare. Side pockets fit 4 energy bars. Front pocket fits fork, knife & napkins. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Slayer

customer_reviews.title: Adequate, nice size
customer_reviews.text: It's a bigger lunchbox, I have no issues packing an array of different sized containers. I am not sure that it would keep things super cool for long, but it does the job during the hour commute until it goes back into the refrigerator. The inside is easier to wash than the outside, and the strings on the zipper keep coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: triny_dmr

customer_reviews.title: Holds A Lot of food & Drinks! My Son Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 36 year old son. He is a care giver. He averages 50+ hours a week on the job! He loves this. He packs several meals a day in this as he works in several towns each day! He may eat lunch a hundred miles from breakfast! This has been a mini God send! We both highly recommend it! Sometimes he says he has 6 sandwiches in there & snacks! Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Weigel Manis

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely perfect. Picked this out for my boyfriend who works ...
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect. Picked this out for my boyfriend who works 12 hour shifts so takes two meals usually. It has two separate insulated compartments which is perfect. On the bottom I pack his "dinner" with a cool pack, and on the top I pack his "lunch" which is usually something hot. Now I don't have to worry about what order to place everything in since the hot and cold won't mix anymore. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Qamza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my daughters daycare to pack her lunch. I like that I can keep her snacks in the top and her lunch with an ice pack in the bottom. The separation is great. Easy to wipe down. When I leave the house in the morning I have an adult size backpack, my purse, and this lunchbox. I love that it has an adjustable strap. I can strap everything to me and hold her when walking out the door. When I come home the ice pack is still cold.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Able to hold my lunch plus more. Very professionl looking also. Not sure if its totally leak proof but i did drop some liquid in and it didnt leak out.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Has a nice thick strap for over the shoulder, which can be adjusted. The two compartments are decent size for food containers, drinks, and snacks. With water bottles I just lay it sideways in the bag and never have issues with drinks leaking through the bag. Easy to clean inside and wipe down on outside of the lunch bag. Overall, really happy with this purchase for my boyfriend for work. Great product for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for long days! Great capacity!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for those long days of sports and camp. We love the design with two compartments, small zippered pocket and long adjustable strap. We are able to throw breakfast and snacks in the top and lunch in the bottom, plus some pocket change in the zippered pocket just in case. The adjustable strap allows him to throw it cross body and leave his hands free to carry his gear. This was a fantastic selection that meets our needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Churchill

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest lunchbag ever. Don't buy a plain bag. This lunchbag opens like a hungry transformer ready to feed me. I love the great quality it is just awesome. I bought the large black version and when I take it to work they turn my bag sideways to fit in the metal scanner. I don't enjoy my food going sideways at all. But I am getting some lunchbag containers so it should be more prepared for crazy situations while being food organized. I am so happy with my lunchbag when chilling at work with all the unprepared other workers. And ole me was prepared by getting a lunchbag. Just fantastically a smart inventive design.
customer_reviews.author: DrakeShockFire

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting into meal prepping and needed a lunch box that could handle my breakfast, lunch, and occasionally dinner. This does it with easy and grace. I can fit everything for my day and it doesn’t feel squished. While it can’t make packing your meals fun (because what can?) it does make it WAY LESS STRESSFUL! If you’re struggling with fitting food or you just want something that is going to look beautiful and hold up then this is the lunch box for you.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle LeBoeuf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for a large lunch bag with two compartments. I love this bag because it’s large enough for me to carry lots of food at different temperatures and has a zipper for me to place my utensils. The only down side is that the zipper sometimes is hard to go strong the curved are but adding a little pull fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Good Lunch bag.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really do this bag justice with this review. I have a refrigerator in my office and I use the bag to take lunch to and from my office. I told my wife that I needed something besides a plastic ( Box Store) bag to take my lunch in every day. It's a great bag. You can fit a full-size plate in the bottom compartment along with plenty of side items.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Top only opens halfway
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another similar cooler that I've had before, and this one is nice, but what I don't like is that the top only unzips halfway where my previous one you could fully open the top compartment. It's usable, it just seems like an odd way to build it now that I had one with a more accessible top.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Someone left a previous review saying this is the best lunchbox ever
customer_reviews.text: Someone left a previous review saying this is the best lunchbox ever. It sounded hyperbolic, but after several months, this is definitely the best lunchbox I have owned. Plenty of room for food containers and drinks. I take it to work every day. The top compartment is useful for storing snacks and other small things that I may need to bring along with me to work I don't feel like carrying separately. Material holds up well, no tears or difficulty using zippers.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: well designed lunchbox with lots or room
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lunchbox. It has a deceiving amount of room. The separate compartments is great so that your sandwich doesn't get so cold its wet. I keep all my fruit and veggies in one compartment and my sandwich which requires less cold in the other compartment. I recommend getting smaller ice packs since this lunchbox keeps things plenty cold and chilled.
customer_reviews.author: S.Nak

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was recommended by Amazon. It is absolutely huge and much too big for everyday lunches. If I brought this to work my co-workers would probably wonder what kind of enormous lunch I was bringing.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for over a year. The plastic handle is a piece of crap that broke into pieces but the nylon strap handle within is strong. Stitching and zippers have held up well. Keeps food cold with ice packs for my 10 hour work shifts. Three people at my work have the same lunch bag, LOL. I like it a lot and if it ripped apart tomorrow would buy another in a heart beat. Fits all my snacks/food/drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Impaler2

customer_reviews.title: Decent lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Been using it over a month and it's a good lunch box. It will keep stuff warm or cold. It will not keep the upper warm, the lower cold, or the other way around. It's only one or the other. I will not buy it again when time comes to replace it but I won't flat out replace it until it's days are done. It's big enough to hold plenty of food and the storage pockets are handy for keys, phone charger, and a work badge. The front zipper pocket holds utensils without a problem. It's ok but it isn't anything to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew I.

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunchbox. It is truly waterproof- I have had tons of spills in this and it is SO easy to simply wipe out and it's good as new! It also fits a lot of stuff. It doesn't stay the coldest so if you are hoping for your lunch to stay nice and chilled for over 6 hours (using ice packs) then this may not be the one for you. Have used this for 3+ months now and it still looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. I'm an avid lifter and pack large meals, snacks and supplements and this lunch box is perfect due to all of the separate compartments. Keeps everything cool/warm, doesn't leak and is very easy to clean. It's large but the handle and strap are durable and sturdy. Can't believe this is less than $20 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Vang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big meals
customer_reviews.text: I am a powerlifter so I need to pack big meals 3000+ calories, so this is perfect for me. Lots of room, you cannot go wrong with this in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: miguel12345

customer_reviews.title: Seemed quality but we returned because of compartment sizes
customer_reviews.text: We returned this. We have had other lunch containers much like this but this particular one does not allow you to combine the twp sections. Others have had a zip away portion so you could make one large section instead of two smaller. The two smaller sectins are too small to be of much use at all for us.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie DeBuhr

customer_reviews.title: Used 5 days a week
customer_reviews.text: This thing is big enough for me to take both a lunch and dinner to work, which I frequently do. It is has held up well despite being used almost daily for going on two years. Wish it was machine washable--I don't feel that it's getting completely cleaned by just wiping it, but that wouldn't stop me from buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: terracedweller29

customer_reviews.title: Great lunchbox. I usually put one tupperware in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lunchbox. I usually put one tupperware in the bottom as well as a soda can. Then some breakfast bars in the side slip-pockets. When I am expecting to be at lunch for a particularly long time, there's plenty of room in the top compartment for another tupperware and soda can. I took the shoulder strap off because it was annoying and unnecessary. But it's there if you want it. I found now need for it since the grip handle is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ben BalesTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my husband's old lunch box and it's pretty sturdy. It also holds all his snacks (that he doesn't want me to know he buys like candy bars and junk). Who knows what all he stores in that thing...but it makes him happy and he never goes hungry at work :). This is a great lunch box for the working man - and woman!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big lunchbox at good price
customer_reviews.text: I've only had for a short time so I can't comment on durability yet. Things I like are how much room it has and how it keeps things cold. Would like the area around the zipper to be stiffer to keep it in place to make it easier to zip and unzip. Overall so far it is a great lunchbox especially at the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Thor T.

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box! A bit on the big side.
customer_reviews.text: I like this one a lot. It’s a bit on the big side. See picture for scale. Maybe not the coolest one for impressing your work buddies in the break room, but does the job. If your coworkers are that judgemental, then maybe you need to find a different table anyway! You’re a strong, independent man, and you just want a durable place to hold your lunch!
customer_reviews.author: The Guy Who Reviews Some Stuff

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lunch bag. I use it everyday. It fits 2 of my re usable food containers and an ice pack in the bottom compartment. It also fits more than enough snacks and other food items in the very conviently placed top compartment. It also has a zipper pouch for forks and other utensils. A good re usable food container with this are the ones that come in bulk from costco.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: A pail that holds it all.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this lunch pail. Bought one for my son-in-law and my daughter kept using it, so I got one for her as well. They are into healthy eating and take a large number of fruits and vegetables for lunch and snacks at work. This is perfect for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food Bag
customer_reviews.text: The price is right, very durable, has so much space, and it's very easy to wash, I washed it in the wash machine and they was no problem. Nothing comes out from the back, it doesn't leak at all. Keeps my food fresh, either way I want it, it either keeps it cool or hot. My coworkers at work were really complication me for the bag that it looks nice; it does look nice to be honest and very stylish. Was looking for something like this that has a handle and something that I can put around my neck, I found it in this 2 in 1. Really worth it for the price that I brought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Auqheeb K Malik

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Box
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have purchased. Yes, it is a little on the bigger side, but I’m able to fit my breakfast, lunch and snacks in. It’s fits my needs. It’s very durable and does not leak. The insulation works great. I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for long work days
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee needed something for long car trips. This is super spacious for extra snacks on top of a packed lunch and beverages. We purchased ice/cold packs separately and this lunch box keeps the contents insulated and cold for a very long time. The second smaller compartment is also a nice convenience.
customer_reviews.author: lookn4smitty

customer_reviews.title: Durable and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Holds medium ice pack, Rubbermaid sandwich case, 3 water bottles and a small juice bottle in the bottom half. Top half holds all of my supplies (approx 50 medical gloves, hand sanitizer, alcohol wipes, thermometer, medium personal case, sunglasses, snack bars, and other small misc items). I stretch the top and bottom compartments to the limit sometimes and nothing has come apart yet. Very sturdy. Stands alone well. I’d highly recommended it if it’s the size you need.
customer_reviews.author: JuJuBear29

customer_reviews.title: Very good lunchbox. Nice size
customer_reviews.text: I love this lunchbox. Perfect size. Fits more than you would think. Cold stuff on the bottom and the top pocket is very large. And I put my wallet in the little front pocket but don’t till anyone. There are two side pockets as well. I had bought a previous lunch box from amazon that looked like a decent size but when I got it, it was tiny :( I’m very glad I returned it and got this
customer_reviews.author: Steven Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch box for a guy who likes to eat
customer_reviews.text: My husband works landscaping and has used this box for a couple of weeks now. I've accidentally splashed food on it, and it wipes right off. With a couple ice packs it keeps his food and drink cold. For years he used a plastic lunch box and I couldn't fit much in it, because it wasn't flexible. This is great. It's flexible and extra large. He likes to take 5 water bottles, two sandwiches, and several snacks. We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Berger

customer_reviews.title: Product could use a heavier duty zipper.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent lunch bag. Serves it’s purpose. However, I’m a commercial construction worker and the job sites on which I work demand a higher standard. Some of the stitching became undone and the main zipper kept getting caught on one of the corners until the zip mechanism itself broke right off of the zipper teeth. I do like how there are two separate compartments as I like to bring both hot and cold food to work. Product could use better seaming and heavier duty zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Received it crushed! No matter how hard I try it’s crushed. Not sturdy at all. I put in one soda can and there’s a large bulge under the bag. See picture... returning. Don’t recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Fits my luggage rack Perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This one holds all I need for a day trip on the motorcycle. With the social distancing, I stay out of restaurants. I pack a snack and beverage, and when lunch time rolls around, I find a nice space to park, find a bench and enjoy the sights and relax with my bag lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: Large, floppy backup lunchbox.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected and a bit floppy. It has a lot of room and fits the meal prep containers I have with a ton of room to spare. The zipper do not feel sturdy. I ended up getting a different lunchbox but decided to keep this one as a backup since it will work in a pinch and wasn’t expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Top compartment doesn’t keep cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store my pumped breast milk in and my pump parts. The bottom part keeps the milk cold with my ice packs that surround the bottles. I used the top compartment to keep my pump parts cold but even though it is insulated, my pump parts aren’t ever as cold as I’d like them to be which poses a bacteria risk. This cooler is also much bigger than I expected. If you’re using just the bottom for cold stuff and the top for dry stuff that doesn’t need cooled, then this would work. Overall, disappointed in its bulkiness and the top compartment not staying cold.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Reese

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I decided to purchase this lunch bag. It’s holds so much. Great for road trips and trips to the beach
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kleven

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Life!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, a bit dramatic with my that title, but I found the product to be incredibly useful and durable. I bought this in preparation for jaw surgery, knowing I'd need to start bringing in liquefied / pureed foods once I started returning to work. I found it to be the perfect for the ~30 minute commute, with or without a freezer pack included. As for the people who have complained it's "too big" - get a grip. The product dimensions are clearly spelled out in the description and the numbers are accurate. Try reading first rather than complaining later.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Jones

customer_reviews.title: It's big and awesome
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for over a year now and use it every work day. It's big - so there's plenty of room to bring lunch and then some. It's also been very sturdy - no issues with it tearing or with the zippers or anything else. A great lunch bag/cooler for anyone looking for one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for long shifts.
customer_reviews.text: For the long shifts at work this is perfectly. It fits four28 Oz (3.5 Cups), 7.2” x 5” x 2.5 meal prep containers on the bottom and you can see the top with two pop cans with room left over and I verified everything zips up. Take out one or two and replace with a freezer pack to keep it cool. I know the meal prep containers got 3.5 stars, probably because the locks on the lid eventually break but I'm washing by hand and not in the dishwasher hoping to get a much longer use out of them. Not sure, I've only had them 8-9 months but still working out.
customer_reviews.author: CBSX01

customer_reviews.title: It's as bad as the reviews say it is
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item and got a refund. I wouldn't recommend this brand to anyone that I know. The design, size and product itself was just right. The manufacturing of this product was just poor. As soon as I took it out of the sealed plastic bag I noticed that lunch box already ripping on one side. Some of the stetching was already coming apart for a brand new item. I was going to do a return swap but didn't want to end up with another bad lunch box.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Cha

product_meta.title: MIER Adult Lunch Box Insulated Lunch Bag Large Cooler Tote Bag for Men, Women, Double Deck Cooler(Black)
feature_bullets: MIER reusable lunch box with a soft pu handle strap and a detachable shoulder strap for easily carry. Upper compartment easy to access through front opening with a 2-way dual zipper closure

Two sections that keep cold and warm items separate. On top, a roomy pouch is great for chips, fruit, drinks snacks and cookies. Square bottom compartment used to carry your lunch, sandwich, salad and etc
A front zipper pocket for putting your utensils, napkins, keys, small change, cards and other small stuffs, and two small side pockets for additional needs
Interior insulated PEVA lining is Eco-friendly and food safe, wipes clean easily
Dimension 10.2x7.9x11inches, This thermal tote is great for packing large amounts of food, even could contain the whole day food that you need

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars10,530 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
